sentences.en: "Tough, isn'tit?" was all she said, but Amy felt the depth of her unspoken sympathy.
sentences.cn: “很艰难，对不对？”她只说了这一句，但埃米感觉到了她未出口的深切同情。

sentences.en: His face was expressionless, but Alex felt the unspoken criticism.
sentences.cn: 他面无表情，但亚历克斯能感觉到他未明言的批评之意。

sentences.en: I came to understand the unspoken words in his work.
sentences.cn: 我领悟到了他作品中的潜台词.

sentences.en: Most designers share the unspoken belief that fashion is a valid form of visual art.
sentences.cn: 大多数设计者都认同这样一种不言而明的理念，即时尚是视觉艺术的一种重要形式。

sentences.en: Our mightiest feeling are always those which remain most unspoken.
sentences.cn: 最强烈的总是那些最缄默的感情.

sentences.en: Our mightiest feelings are always those which remain most unspoken.
sentences.cn: 我们最强烈的感情总是那些最缄默的.

sentences.en: Pub - goers will indicate in unspoken ways if they are interested in chatting.
sentences.cn: 上酒吧的人如果有兴趣交谈的话,会用 非 言语方式表现出来.

sentences.en: She was fanciful, had all sorts of unspoken preferences, and was easily offe nded.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢空想, 有着种种不说出口的偏爱, 因而容易生气.

sentences.en: The mightiest affection is that you remain unspoken.
sentences.cn: 最强烈的感情是你默默的爱心.

sentences.en: The power of humor to dissolve a hostile confrontation often lies in its unspoken promise.
sentences.cn: 幽默能够缓解敌对冲突,其力量在于它那不言而喻的许诺.

sentences.en: The unspoken mobilization order for the silkworm campaign reached everywhere and everyone.
sentences.cn: 蚕事的动员令也在各方面发动了.

sentences.en: There had been an unspoken agreement between them that he would not call for her at Seymour House.
sentences.cn: 他们之间曾经有过默契，那便是他不会到西摩屋去找她。

sentences.en: There is an unspoken understanding that Hugh will be in charge while Jeanne is away.
sentences.cn: 大家有了默契,珍妮不在的时候由休来负责.

sentences.en: They prefer to break another great unspoken rule - reading their partner's diary.
sentences.cn: 对方说的话也不一定安全,很多受访者承认曾偷听过对方的“秘密 ” 谈话.

words.tran_cn: 无言的；未说出口的；不言而喻的

trans.tran_cn: 未说出口的，无人与之交谈的，没人理睬的，不言而喻的
trans.tran_en: not said for other people to hear

trans.tran_cn: 取消，撤回( unspeak的过去分词)
